doc.title: Good Riddance Chief Illiniwek
doc.plot: Good Riddance Chief Illiniwek is a satirical look at one of America's historically institutionalized derogatory portrayals of the White man's Indian upon notification of this iniquitous depiction's retirement. The combined use of historical imagery with contemporary imagery and the utilization of the infamous Ten Little Indians song provide the backdrop for this satire from one Native American's perspective.
